item.title: CVE-2022-2316|2024-08-03T00:32:09.493Z -- devolutions -- devolutions%20server
item.description: HTML injection vulnerability in secure messages of Devolutions Server before 2022.2 allows attackers to alter the rendering of the page or redirect a user to another site.
